mese ohu anya yendun as bohoya, mese anyaoyen boho as di sasara awidina sathwaya mada wa as denna wu budu bawhi upekshawima ohugema nunuwanehi mulbasma ya, thawa da me ak mul nathi sasara ek sathwayekuge ambaudaruwan jathi jathiyehi di ohu handa handa sitiya di sathuran alwa bandagena giya walgoda balu kala mage buduhu ambau daruwan banda dun goda us ma ya, mese sasara pinak nokota thamage ambau daruwan sathunta bohokotadi awidina sathwaya ambaudaruwan dan diya neාhemi yi buduwimehi upeksha wima ohuge ma nunuwanehi mul basma ya, me dharmakathawehi di th samaharu wiyyerwasathwa buduwimehi lobhaya kerethi, thawa da samahara kenek kapek nam beho kalek da, asandkhyathayak namuth beho sandkhyawekla, budawimata yatath washayen sarasandkhya kaplakshayak perum piruwamana ga, ee gewanne kawara kaleka da?
